ygData.subject: Re: Attack at the cannon (BlackNightmare->Malice, Kup, Maximals, Predadocns, Minion)

Malice:
 
"Sorry," the male says before standing up, only to sit on the edge of the bed.
"You should get some sleep," he said, holding a hand out to help her stand up.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

The femme reacted as if she were awaking of a sort of dream "I... I 
just was thinking about what happened in battle"said the femme while 
she cleaned her tears wit her hand"and please, as I asked you, among 
us don't call me master"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> Malic dreamt.  He dreamed something was dragging him down, into 
unknown depths, while Blacknightmare was being pulled up, into 
equally unknown depths.  He fough to reach up and finally grab the 
femme's hand.  But two unseen forces pulled at them, eventually 
Blacknightmare slipped from his grasp, and disappeared.  Before 
waking, he called out to her, before everything went black.  He 
wakes with a start.  He felt a cold spot on his shoulder.  He looks 
over to it to see shiny drops there, then up to Blacknightmare's 
face, which bore tears streaming down her delicate face.
> "Why do you cry, Master?"
